Producer: Christine Haebler, Trish Dolman, Jennifer Weiss, Simone Urdl
Rating: R (Drug and Alcohol Use|All Involving Teens|Language|Sexual Content|Some Violent Images)
Synopsis: Forced to move to a boring backwater town, a teenager (Kat Dennings) embarks on affairs with a teacher (Josh Lucas) and a stoner classmate (Reece Thompson).
Title: Daydream Nation
